verses.verse: Every <S%G3956><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> To Authorities <S%G1849><s%> Above Him <S%G5242><s%> Let Be Subject. <S%G5293><s%> There <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Is No <S%G2076><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> Those That <S%G1161><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> Authorities <S%G1849><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Have <S%G5021><s%> Been Appointed. <S%G1526><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Sets Himself Against <S%G498><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Authority, <S%G1849><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Ordinance <S%G1296><s%> Resists; <S%G436><s%> And They <S%G3588><s%> That <S%G1161><s%> Resist, <S%G436><s%> To Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> Shall Receive. <S%G2983><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Rulers <S%G758><s%> Are <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G1526><s%> A Terror <S%G5401><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%>, Works, <S%G2041><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Evil Ones. <S%G2556><s%> Dost Thou <S%G2309><s%> Desire <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Be Afraid Of <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ; Authority? <S%G1849><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Practise, <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Have <S%G2192><s%> Praise <S%G1868><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> It; <S%G846><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> For Of <S%G1063><s%> A Servant <S%G1249><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good. <S%G18><s%> But <S%G1437><s%> If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Thou Practisest, <S%G4160><s%> Fear; <S%G5399><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> In Vain <S%G1500><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sword <S%G3162><s%> It Wears; <S%G5409><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> For Of <S%G1063><s%> A Servant <S%G1249><s%>, It Is, <S%G2076><s%> An Avenger <S%G1558><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> To Him That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Does. <S%G4238><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Necessary It Is <S%G318><s%> To Be Subject, <S%G5293><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wrath, <S%G3709><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Conscience. <S%G4893><s%>

On This <S%G1223><s%> Account <S%G5124><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Tribute <S%G5411><s%> Pay Ye; <S%G5055><s%> Ministers <S%G3011><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> They Are, <S%G1526><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> This <S%G846><s%> Same Thing <S%G5124><s%> Attending Continually. <S%G4342><s%>

Render <S%G591><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Their <S%G3588><s%>, Dues : <S%G3782><s%> To Whom <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tribute, <S%G5411><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tribute; <S%G5411><s%> To Whom <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Custom, <S%G5056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Custom; <S%G5056><s%> To Whom <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fear, <S%G5401><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fear; <S%G5401><s%> To Whom <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Honour, <S%G5092><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Honour. <S%G5092><s%>

To No One <S%G3367><s%> Anything (lit. Nothing) <S%G3367><s%> <S%G3784><s%> Owe Ye, <S%G1487><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Love <S%G25><s%> One Another : <S%G240><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Loves <S%G25><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other, <S%G2087><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Has Fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

Not <S%G3588><s%> For, <S%G1063><s%> Thou <S%G3756><s%> Shalt Commit Adultery, <S%G3431><s%> Thou <S%G3756><s%> Shalt Not Commit Murder, <S%G5407><s%> Thou <S%G3756><s%> Shalt Not Steal, <S%G2813><s%> Thou <S%G3756><s%>, Shalt Not Bear False Witness, <S%G5576><s%> Thou <S%G3756><s%> Shalt Not Lust; <S%G1937><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Commandment, <S%G1785><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%>, It Is Summed Up, <S%G346><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This, <S%G3588><s%> Thou Shalt Love <S%G25><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4139><s%> Neighbour <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Thyself. <S%G1438><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Neighbour, <S%G4139><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Does <S%G3756><s%> Not Work : <S%G2038><s%> Fulness <S%G4138><s%> Thereof <S%G3767><s%> Of The Law <S%G3551><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love Is. <S%G26><s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> This, <S%G5124><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time, <S%G2540><s%> That The <S%G3754><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> We It Is <S%G2248><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Sleep <S%G5258><s%> Should Be Roused; <S%G1453><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Nearer <S%G1452><s%> Is Of Us <S%G2257><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salvation, <S%G4991><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> We Believed. <S%G4100><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> Is Advanced, <S%G4298><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Has Drawn Near; <S%G1448><s%> We Should Cast Off <S%G659><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Darkness, <S%G4655><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Put On <S%G1746><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Armour <S%G3696><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Light. <S%G5457><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%> Becomingly <S%G2156><s%> We Should Walk; <S%G4043><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> In Revels <S%G2970><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drinking, <S%G3178><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> In Chambering <S%G2845><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wantonness, <S%G766><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> In Strife <S%G2054><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Emulation. <S%G2205><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> Put On <S%G1746><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Forethought <S%G4307><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Take <S%G4160><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Desire. <S%G1939><s%>
